newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE white sugar ends sharply up on NY rally.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE white sugar ends sharply up on NY rally.

text.p: LIFFE white sugar futures finished sharply higher on Wednesday on the back of fund-led rally in New York raws futures.
Fund buying pushed New York's July contract up 25 points to a high of 11.37 cents per lb, boosting sentiment in London and putting steam behind the spot August whites contract.
Nearby values gained ground as August firmed and Aug/Oct spread widened to $8.00 from Tuesday's $5.80 close.
By the close, August was up $4.30 at $315.20, the day's highs, after clearing its initial resistance at $312.50. Its intraday low was $310.80.
Technically, the next resistance is seen at $316.50 although the 14-day relative strength index was fast approaching the 70-value overbought buffer.
October was up $2.30 at $307.20 and overall volume reached a hefty 3,482 lots, mostly in August.
